faqs.question: How do Swiggy vouchers work?
faqs.answer:
Swiggy vouchers are digital gift cards that can be used to pay for orders on Swiggy. Here's how they work:

  • Purchase a voucher of your desired value
  • Receive the voucher code instantly via email
  • Apply the code during checkout on Swiggy
  • The voucher amount will be deducted from your total bill

faqs.question: What is the validity period of these vouchers?
faqs.answer:
The validity period varies based on the voucher denomination:

  • ₹500 voucher: Valid for 3 months
  • ₹1000 voucher: Valid for 6 months
  • ₹2000 voucher: Valid for 12 months

Note: The validity period starts from the date of purchase.

faqs.question: Can I use multiple vouchers in one order?
faqs.answer:
No, currently Swiggy allows only one voucher to be used per order. However, you can:

  • Save unused vouchers for future orders
  • Share vouchers with family and friends
  • Use them across different restaurants on Swiggy

faqs.question: What if I lose my voucher code?
faqs.answer:
Don't worry! We've got you covered:

  1. Check your email for the original voucher code
  2. Contact our support team with your order ID
  3. We'll help you retrieve your code within 24 hours

Tip: Save your voucher codes in a secure place and take a screenshot for backup.

faqs.question: Are there any restrictions on using these vouchers?
faqs.answer:
Yes, there are some terms and conditions:

  • Cannot be used with other offers/discounts
  • Non-transferable and non-refundable
  • Cannot be exchanged for cash
  • Must be used in full in a single order
